queries.query:
from(bucket: "capstone7")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "demand")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ForecastDemand" or r["_field"] == "RealDemand" or r["_field"] == "CP7Forecast")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "capstone7")
  |> range(start : v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "demand" and (r["_field"] == "RealDemand" or r["_field"] == "ForecastDemand"))
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> sort(columns: ["RealDemand"], desc: false)

from(bucket: "capstone7")
  |> range(start : v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "demand")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "ForecastDemand" or r._field == "RealDemand")
  |> difference()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > -100 and r._value <= 100)
